name: Shijin no Maki Koten Tsumego Shuu
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Shijin no Maki Koten Tsumego Shuu" is a board game in which you have to solve up to 500 tsumego questions simulating the conflicts of territory in the Chinese Classic "The Chronicle of the Three Kingdoms". Play Shougi as you enjoy the story of the Kingdom Shu lead by the famous Zhu Ge Liang which united China.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
